#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define epsilon 1e-12
typedef long long ll;
ll n,t,r;
double p;
map<ll,double> dp;
double solve(ll x){
double prob;
if(x>n)
    return 0.0;
if(dp.find(x)!=dp.end())
    return dp[x];
prob = pow(1.0/x,p);
if(prob < epsilon)
    return 0.0;
dp[x] = prob*(solve(x+t+r)+1) + ((1-prob)*solve(x+t));
return dp[x];
}
int main(){
cin >> n >> p >> t >> r;
double ans = solve(1);
printf("%lf\n",ans);
return 0;
}
